Text:
Vasjok, Ti geroj :)!
Spasibo za jazikovie moduli Latinskogo jazika!
Ochenj hotelosj bi Italjjanskij 3 i 4 urovni.

Great upload! Only a few more languages left before it's complete. 
  The only levels missing are - 

Italian - 4, 5
Irish - 2,3
Hebrew - 3
Vietnamese - 1,2,3
Tagalog - 3
English (British) - 4,5

Everything else has been uploaded!

hey VasiaZozulia, i got L 4&5 of american english, when i put it on the RS it says an update is available for that level that came out this year, i wanted to know if i can let RS download the update for those levels without a problem or not...?
Yes, it's totally safe to download the updates for the languages.
Great torrent. Anyone know where to get swedish Audio companion?

I came across the original posting by Savonarola on 20 May 11.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6409188

FYI as additional source.
I've always wanted to learn Latin, dead language or not. I think it's about high time I tried it. Thank you very much for the opportunity. :)
Woah, finally! Thanks A LOT VasiaZozulia, I've been looking for this simply everywhere! Hey, if you have russian or french 4 & 5 could you send us? =D Thanks

Please, please, please can anyone tell me where to find the Dutch Audio Companion?

I'm struggling with some pronunciation!
Any pointers greatly appreciated.

Hello and Happy New Year! 
I was wondering if you could upload italian l4 and 5, or if you knew of anyone who has. PLZ n TY
I mounted it but I can't actually run it, feeling stupid, can someone help?

What version of Rosetta Stone are these files for? I found one other Latin file that said it was for v3, but I have v3 downloaded, but it said I need to update Rosetta Stone to install these languages. Thanks for the help!
Can't access all the lessons. Says I need activation codes. Please help
